StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegeSemesterVisitEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @FiscalYear integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN
SELECT hs.Organiza.on_ID AS Organiza.onID, cp.[FiscalYear], cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, cp.CollegePro.leID, --cp.PriorityCode, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, cvd.[NumVisitsPlanned] AS NumFYPlannedVisits, cvd.[ContractGoal] AS NumFYContractGoal
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd
INNER JOIN [USMC].[CollegeVisit] cv ON cv.[CollegeVisitID] = cvd.[CollegeVisitID]
INNER JOIN [USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp ON cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] = cvd.[SCHOOL_CODE] and cp.FiscalYear = cvd.FiscalYear
INNER JOIN HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.School_Code = cp.School_Code
WHERE hs.Organiza.on_ID = @Organiza.onID and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
ORDER BY CollegeName END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
